Articles.Content: I nuke the hill. Now there is no more hill. My crater.

It seems like you can't teach an old dog new tricks, can you?

I build my hill out of lead, and put a nuclear bunker inside so I can survive a nuclear attack. Pretty much anything else too.

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-21T07:33:51Z" title="07/21/2018 07:33  AM" data-short="5 yr">July 21, 2018</time> by Ho Lam Kerman**

I eat the hill. And the bunker. And regurgitate it, claiming it for myself.

My hill.

It's a pity that there was an old nuclear waste storage in the hill.  

Though, it's your choice.
I can survive anythiiiiiiing! My hill.

Spoiler

immortalUsers = ~~The Minmus Derp~~ HansonKerman

hillOwnership = Pikachu

Now the hill belongs to a Pikachu. See [here](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pikachu_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29)for explanation of Pikachu.
I erase the pikachu. My hill.

I crash Minmus into Kerbin, destroying both as well as your hill. I build a new hill on the Mun as it is flung out into interplanetary space.

My hill.

> > > 8 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said: > > > I erase the pikachu. My hill. > What is a pikachu? I clearly said the hill belongs to a Pikachu. > > > 5 hours ago, RealKerbal3x said: > > > I crash Minmus into Kerbin, destroying both as well as your hill. I build a new hill on the Mun as it is flung out into interplanetary space. > > > > > My hill. > I [Alolan Rattata](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Rattata_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) it.

Kerbals catch Pikachu and make [Špekáču](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C5%A0pek%C3%A1%C4%8Dek)

Spoiler

![220px-%C5%A0pek%C3%A1%C4%8Dky.JPG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/67/%C5%A0pek%C3%A1%C4%8Dky.JPG/220px-%C5%A0pek%C3%A1%C4%8Dky.JPG)

Then they catch Rattata and make [Rattatouille](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ratatouille)

Spoiler

![250px-Ratatouille.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/27/Ratatouille.jpg/250px-Ratatouille.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-22T04:48:08Z" title="07/22/2018 04:48  AM" data-short="5 yr">July 22, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

Too bad I can't get radiation poisoning. Or lead poisoning.

My hill.

You can't get the poisoning, but the sharp metal pieces unfortunately puncture your intestine, causing a lethal infection. You die and the hill is returned to its rightful owner, [@Ho Lam Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188455-ho-lam-kerman/).
Until police fences it for unlnown time.
I [Alolan Rattata](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Rattata_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) the police.

[Kilrathi](https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/scale_medium/0/24/11718-kilrathi.jpg) have eaten Rattati.

All your hill are cats'.

Meowth, the Scratch Cat Pokémon. A Normal-type. It sleeps a lot during the daytime and during the nighttime becomes active, moving around its territory. Ghost-types are strong against Normal-types. I use my Haunter. Hill taken. Also, my Haunter is technically the king, so don't think about using your puny Normal-types on me. **Edited July 22, 2018 by HansonKerman**
The hill is haunted. You obey to its Haunter king.

> 
> 
> 21 hours ago, Ho Lam Kerman said:
> 
> 
> You can't get the poisoning, but the sharp metal pieces unfortunately puncture your intestine, causing a lethal infection.
> 

I'm pretty sure being [entirely made of metal](http://ftl.wikia.com/wiki/Races/Lanius) makes me immune to that.

I use [Crunch](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Crunch_%28move%29) on the Haunter. My hill.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, FireKerb said:
> 
> 
> I'm pretty sure being [entirely made of metal](http://ftl.wikia.com/wiki/Races/Lanius) makes me immune to that.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I use [Crunch](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Crunch_%28move%29) on the Haunter. My hill.
> 

Kerbals on fire die immediately. You die and i take over your hill.
BadS Kerbals have been restored and throw you down.

Ambush!

SpongeBob's hill.![You+like+spongebobs+laughdont+you+anon+_](https://static1.fjcdn.com/thumbnails/comments/You+like+spongebobs+laughdont+you+anon+_242767b9070054b83b34d1651d5742c6.png) u like patties?
I am impervious to anything. I eat the hill. I regurgitate the hill. My hill.
Take your laxative and make a hill.

I use [Teleport](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Teleport_%28move%29). My Pokémon are fully healed.

I take the hill using my Pokémon team: [Ditto,](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Ditto_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) [Flareon,](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Flareon_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) [Jolteon,](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Jolteon_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) and of course, my personal favorites, [Grass-types](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Grass_%28type%29). [Leafeon,](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Leafeon_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) [Ivysaur,](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Ivysaur_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29) and the cutest of them all, [Flabébé.](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Flab%C3%A9b%C3%A9_%28Pok%C3%A9mon%29)

My (and the Pokémon's) hill.
Pokemondo not exist in this universe. My hill.
